Description: Saudia Dairy and Foodstuff (known as: Sadafco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2005. Sadafco operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. It has Companies operating across Northern Africa and Middle East. Sadafco is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 1976.
